Private Attributes

uint32_t mAddress

Detailed Description

IP4Address holds address of IPv4 model. 

 IP4Address ip4(10, 8, 49, 63); // Create a address for 10.8.49.63

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

gaia::net::IP4Address::IP4Address ( uint32_t  address) [explicit]

initialize IPv4 address using a 32bit integer.

Parameters:
addressIPv4 address in a 32bit integer, the integer should be expressed in network byte order.
gaia::net::IP4Address::IP4Address ( uint8_t  byte1,
uint8_t  byte2,
uint8_t  byte3,
uint8_t  byte4 
)

initialize IP4Address using dot notation. 

 // 192.168.1.129 should be initialized with
 IP4Address(192, 168, 1, 129);
Parameters:
byte1the first byte of address.
byte2the second byte of address.
byte3the third byte of address.
byte4the 4th byte of address.
gaia::net::IP4Address::IP4Address ( const gaia::base::String &  ipString) [explicit]

Parse an IPv4 dot-notation string to an IPv4 address structure.

Parameters:
ipStringAn IPv4 dot-notation string. For example "127.0.0.1".
